name: The Light in the Heart
description:
Learn to light a candle in the darkest moments of someone’s life. Be the light that helps others see; it is what gives life its deepest significance.

- Publish the work that you collect through your social media account by including the credit of the creator's name.

- You have the right to print the work and it is strictly forbidden to sell and trade in physical form.

Regards Riff as Destroyxstairs
